attributes.action: Save our NHS, say no to privatisation and ensure more money is spent on the NHS and where it is needed, increase nurses for safety rather than risk our safety with cut backs!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As time passes by it seems to become rather worrying that the NHS has been allowed to be nurtured to its current state. The staffing levels at ward level needs to be increased, afterall this is where we as patients feel the benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
